page.title: 13A FARM BORDERING WHITLEY
page.content: Woodbank Farm has 55 acres. We have 45 cows and three heifers.Our dog fetches the cows every morning and night except in the winter because they are kept inside.The{two}cats live in the implement shed, we give them milk every night and they hunt the rest of their food. We have a shed at the back of the garage where we keep 11 hens and we keep a broody one in the shippon. We have one cow trailer that carries calves to Chelford Market on some Mondays. We grow apples, pears, plums and damsons, and sometimes strawberries for ourselves,and we grow silage or hay for our cows. We have 44 black and white cows and one brown and white cow.Mr F and Mrs F work the farm on their own, but get help from their neighbours when harvesting silage and hay. There is a large wood in the middle of which there is a rubbish tip
